bs-contextmenu-desc: Provides context menus for various links.
bs-contextmenu-pref-modus-just-right-mou: Just click on right mouse button (Holding down CTRL will show default browser context menu)
bs-contextmenu-pref-modus-ctrl-and-right: Hold down CTRL and click right mouse button (Normal right mouse button will show default browser menu)
bs-contextmenu-media-view-page: View file description page and file history
